message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $9,500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm glad you're enthusiastic about it. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for it. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting closer, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'm thinking $8,350. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $7,800, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $8,200. This is my final offer, so I hope you can work with me.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already met you at $8,200 and you're coming back down to $7,500? I'm not willing to go that low. I'm going to try one more time to meet you in the middle. I'll offer you $8,000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. This is my last offer, so please let me know what you think.
